Question.Subject: How do I revert back from IE 8 to IE 7?
Question.Content: I made the mistake of upgrading. How do I go back to IE 7?
Question.ChosenAnswer:
Hi there follow the link below:
http://www.microsoft.com/downloads/details.aspx?familyid=9ae91ebe-3385-447c-8a30-081805b2f90b&displaylang=en
Just download IE 7 and reinstall, you can go uninstall IE8 first if you want from windows components on your Programs and features or Add and remove programs.
Good luck :)

Answer.Content:
Hi there follow the link below:
http://www.microsoft.com/downloads/details.aspx?familyid=9ae91ebe-3385-447c-8a30-081805b2f90b&displaylang=en
Just download IE 7 and reinstall, you can go uninstall IE8 first if you want from windows components on your Programs and features or Add and remove programs.
Good luck :)
Download IE 7 here http://www.soft32.com/download_997.html, then uninstall IE 8 then install IE 7 from the file you downloaded there.
